articles.description: Ghostbusters: Afterlife has restored the luster to Sony’s supernatural franchise. The holiday tentpole easily topped the weekend chart with a better-than-expected $44 million from 4,315 theaters at the North American box office after succeeding in luring both…

articles.title: Is a Fifth Wave of COVID-19 on the Horizon? - AARP
articles.description: Coronavirus cases are rising as Americans move indoors for the winter months, but vaccines and new treatments could mean a smaller surge.
articles.content:
